issues.body:
## üôÇ Applicant Information                
- **Email:** raficostar@gmail.com
- **Twitter:** @RaphaStacks
- **Main project/association:** Jing Cash - Transparent P2P Trading Infrastructure
- **Notable ecosystem achievements or impact:** 
  - Deployed and operated battle-tested order book trading system with comprehensive security audits
  - Built trustless atomic swap mechanism requiring no guarantee deposits
  - Created proven L2 Stacks trading infrastructure similar to [[BeefySwap](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC)](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC) but with full transparency and on-chain settlement

## üìÉ Grant Overview
- **Grant Name:** Stacking Rewards Optimizer - Transparent On-Chain Infrastructure
- **Total Budget (USD, STX, or BTC):** $20k USD total - $10k for transparent on-chain reward optimization infrastructure + $10k for automated Foundation positioning system (audit costs not included)
- **Grant Goal (in one sentence):** Deploy transparent on-chain infrastructure to eliminate the hidden 2% fees bleeding from stacking rewards while making all reward conversions fully transparent and auditable.
- **Grant Audience:** Stacking pool operators losing rewards to hidden fees, stackers wanting transparent reward distributions
- **Grant Team:** @Rapha-btc

## üöÄ Grant Mission, Impact, Risks, and Traction
- **Grant Mission:** Address immediate stacking pool crisis where 2% rewards disappear into opaque off-chain platforms like Changelly/SimpleSwap with hidden fees and non-transparent mechanisms. Deploy battle-tested transparent atomic P2P infrastructure (similar to [[BeefySwap](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC)](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC) but fully on-chain and transparent) NOW to stop reward hemorrhaging. Time is money - every cycle delayed costs pools thousands in hidden fees and opacity. All transactions become transparent, auditable, and fee-optimized. Foundation gains positioning as transparent stacking rewards optimizer through automated liquidity provision against whitelisted pools.

- **Grant Impact:** Immediate transparent relief: stops 2% hidden fee bleeding happening every cycle, all conversions become fully auditable on-chain, directly increasing stacker payouts starting next distribution. Eliminates opaque off-chain mechanisms causing reward distribution uncertainty. Foundation gains strategic positioning as ecosystem's transparent stacking optimization infrastructure. STX suppliers get transparent automated Bitcoin exposure through verified pool trading. Measurable transparent ROI: every $100k in pool rewards saves $2k+ in hidden fees with full on-chain auditability.

- **Grant Risks:** Timing risk - every delayed cycle means continued hidden fee bleeding and opacity for pools. Liquidity management requires ongoing attention until automation deployed. Technical risk minimal given proven codebase. Main risk is NOT deploying fast enough to capture immediate transparency and savings opportunity.

- **Traction:** 
     - *Active users:* Multiple stacking pools experiencing immediate hidden fee bleeding and opacity concerns
     - *Transaction volume:* Hundreds of thousands USD in pool rewards processed bi-weekly through opaque platforms, losing 2%+ to hidden fees each cycle
     - *TVL:* N/A (P2P system optimizes transparent flow, doesn't hold funds)
     - *Waitlist:* Urgent demand from pools seeking transparent alternatives to opaque platforms with hidden fee structures

## üõ£Ô∏è Grant Roadmap & Deliverables
- **Deliverable:** Live transparent stacking rewards optimizer enabling immediate on-chain auditable sBTC/STX trading with zero hidden fees (similar to [[BeefySwap](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC)](https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC) but fully transparent L2-native relief), featuring Foundation positioning as transparent automated stacking ecosystem optimizer through whitelisted pool integration.

- **Milestones:** 
  - **Milestone 1 ($10k):** Build the basic P2P trading infrastructure - essentially a transparent order book where stacking pools can swap their sBTC for STX without going through centralized exchanges like Changelly/SimpleSwap. This eliminates the 2% fees and makes transactions transparent/auditable on-chain.
  - **Milestone 2 ($10k):** Add automation where the Foundation provides STX liquidity and can "set-and-forget" - meaning they automatically trade their STX for sBTC at market rates specifically with whitelisted stacking pools. This creates a win-win where pools get instant liquidity without fees, and the Foundation gets automated Bitcoin exposure.

issues.title: Stacks Agent: The AI DeFi Trading Bot on Autopilot
issues.body:
## üôÇ Applicant Information

- **Email:** [hello@stx.city](mailto:hello@stx.city)
- **Twitter:** [@kai_builder](https://x.com/kai_builder)
- **Main project/association:** stx.city
- **Notable ecosystem achievements or impact:**
    - Founded stx.city - the `#1 token launchpad` on Stacks with nearly 2,000 tokens created. Generated 2M STX in trading volume, serving 5k users with over 40k+ transactions
    - Developed essential ecosystem infrastructure: Airdrop Tools, BNS Marketplace, and Lottery platform
    - Proven track record of building user-centric DeFi tools that drive adoption and engagement

## üìÉ Grant Overview

- **Grant Name:** Stacks Agent: The AI DeFi Trading Bot on Autopilot
- **Total Budget (USD, STX, or BTC):** $10,000 USD
- **Grant Goal (in one sentence):** Become the leading AI agent and trading bot on Stacks by onboarding 2,000 new users with 100+ daily active users within 2 months after launching
- **Grant Audience:** DeFi users on Stacks and cross-chain investors seeking yield optimization
- **Grant Team:** @khoa-nvk (with 5+ years of Stacks ecosystem experience, 1+ year constant building on Stacks)

## üöÄ Grant Mission, Impact, Risks, and Traction

- **Grant Mission:** Help crypto users make more money on Stacks by giving them AI-powered smart tools that automatically find the best ways to earn across `ALL` platforms and apps on Stacks.
- **Grant Impact:** The Stacks ecosystem offers many ways to earn money with crypto, like providing liquidity for trading pairs, staking tokens (on Velar, Alex, Bitflow), earning Bitcoin rewards with stacking and liquid stacking (PoX), lending and borrowing (Zest, Granite), and earning yields on stablecoins (Hermetica, Arkadiko), trading memecoins (on stxcity, fakfun) However, it's difficult for most users to know which strategy will make them the most profit in real-time and based on their risk tolerance, even for experienced crypto traders. 
  Stacks Agent will:
	- Onboard web2 users with onramp using embedded wallet infrastructure like Turnkey or Privy
    - Give users live market data and automatic trading features
    - Find profitable pools and range configuration
    - Set up automated LP positions in seconds
    - Manage, leverage and automate all DEX liquidity from a single interface
    - Make advanced money-making strategies accessible to everyone, not just experts
    - Bring more users and money into Stacks DeFi platforms
    - Attract users from other blockchains who want to earn with Bitcoin-backed opportunities or trade Bitcoin memes.
- **Grant Risks:**
    - **Technical integration complexity:** Build modular architecture allowing incremental protocol integration
    - **Market volatility impact:** Implement dynamic risk management and position sizing algorithms
    - **User adoption challenges:** Focus on intuitive UX and proven track record from stx.city community
- **Traction:** Based on stx.city's proven ecosystem engagement:
    - **Active users:** 5,000+ users across existing platforms with high retention rates
    - **Transaction volume:** 2M STX processed on stx.city, demonstrating user trust and platform reliability
    - **Community engagement:** Strong social media presence and community feedback indicating demand for advanced DeFi tools
    - **Partnership potential:** Established relationships with all Stacks protocols - ready for integration
    - **Building in public:** Currently developing the trading bot publicly and receiving significant interest from early adopters ([announcement post](https://x.com/kai_builder/status/1963858275629437328))
	- **Early demos:** Released working prototypes showcasing core functionality ([Demo 1](https://x.com/stxcity/status/1962814507144880383), [Demo 2](https://x.com/stxcity/status/1963627179839013330)) with positive community feedback

## üõ£Ô∏è Grant Roadmap & Deliverables

**Deliverable:** **The first AI Agent on Stacks with fully automated trading and yield farming capabilities.** 

- Users simply connect and the AI handles everything in the background 
- Features seamless web2 onboarding through embedded wallet infrastructure (Turnkey/Privy), eliminating the need for users to manage private keys or understand complex DeFi mechanics. 
- Finding optimal yield opportunities, executing trades, managing LP positions, and rebalancing portfolios automatically. 
- The platform combines intelligent automation with a user-friendly interface, making advanced DeFi strategies as simple as traditional banking while maximizing returns across all major Stacks protocols.

The final version will combine the functionality of Photon Sol Bot (Trading Bot), LPAgent.io (AI Agent) and arcadia.finance (Intelligent DeFi Dashboard).

 **Milestones (in 2 months):**
    - **Milestone 1:** Set up modern web2 onramp to Stacks using embedded wallet platform like Turnkey (Open Source)
    - **Milestone 2:** Build public API for combining all DeFi strategies (Open Source) + Core app infrastructure
    - **Milestone 3:** Deploy main app logic and AI Agent (Closed Source) + Beta launch with initial user testing

P/s: I can use other name for the Agent like stx.bot or stacksbrain that has not been decided yet

issues.title: Jing Cash Endowment STX Provision - Zero Fee Trading for Stacking Pools
issues.body:
**Jing Cash Endowment Proposal: Zero-Fee STX Trading Infrastructure**

---

**Topic:** Jing Cash Endowment STX Provision - Zero Fee Trading for Stacking Pools

**Category:** Apps ‚Ä¢ Stacks DeFi

**Tags:** `stacking` `defi` `trading` `yield` `endowment` `proposal` `no-kyc`

---

**Overview**

Jing Cash is currently offline but represents proven technology. The codebase has been battle-tested through previous live deployments and has undergone comprehensive security audits. The platform is deployment-ready and will operate as an L2 Stacks order book, similar to the STX/BTC market on https://www.beefyswap.fun/markets/STX_BTC except only on L2.

The system requires no guarantee deposits - users simply lock STX or sBTC and unlock by sending the counterpart token. Most importantly, **no KYC is required**, addressing a critical pain point in the ecosystem.

**The KYC Problem**

Current trading solutions create significant friction for stacking pools. A recent example: 3hunna encountered unexpected KYC requirements when swapping via Changelly (https://x.com/3hunnatheArtist/status/1964039842326802451), causing transaction delays. This scenario is unfortunately common - multiple stacking pools have reported reward distributions being frozen pending ID verification and documentation requirements.

**Proposal: Endowment-Backed Zero-Fee Trading**

We propose the endowment provide STX liquidity to Jing Cash in exchange for zero or near-zero fees. This creates substantial benefits:

**For Stacking Pools:**

* Eliminates the typical 1-2% fees charged by platforms like SimpleSwap
* Removes exchange slippage costs
* Provides superior pricing compared to existing alternatives
* Increases net yields distributed to stacking participants
* Maintains complete privacy with no KYC barriers
* **Enables seamless stacking reward distribution automation**

Pool operators can now automate the entire flow: BTC rewards ‚Üí bridge to sBTC ‚Üí P2P orderbook conversion to STX. This eliminates manual intervention and creates a smooth, automated reward distribution system.

**For the Endowment:**

* Automated STX liquidity distribution system
* Portfolio diversification into Bitcoin
* Reduced manual treasury management overhead
* Win-win economic model with measurable ecosystem impact

**Economic Benefits:**

Stacking pools currently lose 1-2% on every swap due to platform fees plus slippage. By eliminating these costs, pools can increase their effective yield distribution by the same margin. The endowment's STX provision enables this fee structure while ensuring adequate order book liquidity.

Pool operators can build fully automated conversion systems, removing operational friction and manual processes from reward distribution.

**Technical Implementation:**

* L2 Stacks native operation for optimal user experience
* Trustless lock/unlock mechanism without deposits
* Proven order book architecture with audit history
* Permissionless access - no registration or verification required

**Conclusion**

This proposal positions the endowment as critical DeFi infrastructure while delivering measurable value to stacking pools and their users. The combination of zero fees, no KYC, automated processes, and battle-tested technology addresses the ecosystem's most pressing trading challenges.

**Important Note:** The code for this system is ultra simple and has been extensively battle-tested through Jing Cash deployments and previously via Friedger's Catamaran swaps. The technical risk is minimal given this proven foundation.

*Community feedback on implementation details and fee structures welcome.*

TL;DR: 
Jing Cash is a P2P platform that lets stacking pools swap their Bitcoin rewards for STX tokens without KYC requirements or the typical 1-2% fees charged by platforms like Changelly, SimpleSwap or Binance. The proposal asks the Stacks endowment to provide STX liquidity to enable zero-fee trading, which would save stacking pools money on every conversion while giving the endowment Bitcoin exposure. This would increase the actual rewards distributed to stackers since pools wouldn't lose 1-2% to trading fees and delays from KYC verification. The system would need ongoing liquidity replenishment since stacking pools receive hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of Bitcoin rewards every two weeks that must be converted to STX, but price oracles like Pyth or DIA could automate the rebalancing process to make it a set-and-forget solution, though that requires additional work but can be done if mandated. Essentially it's a win-win where the endowment funds a more efficient exchange system that benefits the entire stacking ecosystem.

issues.body:
## üôÇ Applicant Information‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää‚Äâ
- **Email:**‚Ää mail@friedger.de
- **Twitter:**‚Ää@LisaLab_BTC
- **Main project/association:** Fast Pool / Ryder
- **Notable ecosystem achievements or impact:** 

  * Operating Fast Pool
  * Contribution to various SIPs
  * Builder of catamaran swaps
  * ...

## üìÉ Grant Overview
- **Grant Name:**‚Ää‚Ää‚ÄäLiquidity for Lisa
- **Total Budget (USD, STX, or BTC):**‚Ää$5,000 + 500k STX locked in a liquidity pool earning fees for the grant sponsor.
- **Grant Goal (in one sentence):** Bring back Lisa to a DEX (after Alex hack)
- **Grant Audience:**‚Ää‚ÄäDeFi users with interest in Liquid Stacking will benefit.
- **Grant Team:**‚Ää @friedger @marvinJanssen

## üöÄ Grant Mission, Impact, Risks, and Traction
- **Grant Mission:**‚Ää
‚Ää‚ÄäLisa suffered from the Alex Hack with the loss of the swapping pool on Alex. The grant shall bring back a swapping pool for LiSTX/STX so LiSTX holder can immediately unstack via swapping. 
- **Grant Impact:**‚Ää‚Ää‚Ää
‚ÄäFirst, the grant will bring back immediate unstacking for liquid stacking users (LiSTX holders). Second, the grant will bring more innovation for liquid stacking protocols through competition. Third, Lisa is a liquid stacking protocol that can also be applied to more tokens than only STX and inspire more liquid stacking activity on Stacks, code and documentation is open source. Fourth, Lisa is governed through a transparent on-chain DAO and can inspire more projects to use on-chain governance. Finally, more integrations of LiSTX can be added in the future.
- **Grant Risks:** 
Adding the swapping pair to a DEX is low risk, as there exist battle-tested flows. Adding liquidity to the LiSTX/STX pool has the risk of any other pool, however, the price is not volatile and any LiSTX can be converted to STX via normal unstacking (PoX). The biggest risk for this grant is that users move to Stacking DAO. We aim to mitigate that risk through public communication of the advantages of Lisa.
- **Traction:** 
     - _Active users:_ all time holders: 17,602, current: 5480 holder of LiSTX
     - _Transaction volume:_ 10k+
     - _TVL:_ at height $18m+ / 7.5m STX, current $1.5m / 2.5m STX
     - _Waitlist:_ No wait list

## üõ£Ô∏è Grant Roadmap & Deliverables
- **Deliverable:**‚Ää A swap pool LiSTX/STX on one DEX
- **Milestones:** 
  1. Add swapping contract for LiSTX/STX pair to one DEX (bitflow, charisma, velar)
  2. Update UI on lisalabs.io
  3. Deploy liquidity from this grant
  4. Promote swapping pool
